import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete location"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/{LocationId}/delete"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Soft-deletes a location. The location record is marked as deleted but not permanently removed from the database. Deleted locations can be restored using the undelete endpoint.

**Important Considerations:**
- Assets, tickets, and users associated with this location may need to be migrated first
- Use the [POST /api/v2.0/locations/migrate](/docs/api/locations/update-location-v-2) endpoint to move associated entities before deletion
- Deleted locations will no longer appear in standard location lists

**Related Endpoints:**
- [PUT /api/v2.0/locations/\{LocationId\}/undelete](/docs/api/locations/update-location-v-2) - Restore a deleted location

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"LocationId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Unique identifier of the location to delete","example":"aa632d8d-486f-ed11-ade6-cc60c8b5ca80"},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication","example":"Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request"}]}

  body={undefined}
